name: MerlintheMagician
0:
”Alexa open merlin the magician.”
”Alexa start merlin the magician.”
”Alexa launch merlin the magician.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: merlin the magician
des: Merlin the magician gives Alexa the ability to read your mind. Pick a number between 1 and 15 and see if Alexa can guess the right number. She'll read the numbers on 7 cards and you answer yes and no. You can even lie to her about one of the cards and she will even tell you which card you lied about.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
